name: io.github.rghsoftware/linux-filesystem
title: Linux Filesystem
description: Enhanced Linux filesystem access with symlinks, permissions, and chmod support

tools.name: read_file
tools.description: Read file contents with Linux-specific features (symlink handling, permission checking)

tools.name: write_file
tools.description: Write files with Linux permission preservation and symlink awareness

tools.name: create_directory
tools.description: Create directories with Linux-specific permission control

tools.name: list_directory
tools.description: List directory contents with detailed Linux metadata (permissions, ownership, symlinks)

tools.name: move_file
tools.description: Move/rename files while preserving Linux permissions and handling symlinks

tools.name: delete_file
tools.description: Safely delete files with Linux permission checks

tools.name: get_file_info
tools.description: Get detailed Linux file metadata: UID/GID, permissions (octal/symbolic), file type, symlink target

tools.name: search_files
tools.description: Search files with Linux-specific features: respect symlinks, hidden files, permissions
